name: Vector Wars (Langstonian)
description:
Install instructions

1. Download the .zip to your desktop or another easily accessible location on your computer

2. Right click the .zip file and then click "Extract All..." to unzip the file

3. A new regular file should now be in the same location you downloaded the .zip, this is where the app is. Open this file and run the executable called "VectorWars.exe"

(side note: some antivirus software might not like you downloading the .zip or .exe, but there is no malicious software anywhere in the files)
